description:
A super light, triple certified rope for when every gram matters. With a soft hand and thin diameter, this rope is well suited to hard onsight attempts, tough redpoints and speedy alpine tours. For extended top-roping sessions you may want to choose a thicker, workhorse rope.

  • Dry treatment on both sheath and core protects against water and dirt
  • Coated yarns allow individual fibres to glide over each other, reducing internal friction and fully utilizing each yarn when loaded, for extra durability
  • Comes lap-coiled by the factory, so ready to climb
  • High sheath percentage increases durability
name: Mammut 9.0 Crag Sender Dry Rope
